arts.ttl: The 2023 Celtic chat with Rodgers that is still motivating Callum McGregor today
arts.sum: Callum McGregor is addicted to Celtic success and is still giving everything to Brendan Rodgers in the pursuit of more trophies.

arts.ttl: Jota thrilled to share magic Celtic moment with opportunistic young fan as he buzzes at being a memory maker
arts.sum: The Portuguese winger came off the bench to bag the fifth for Celtic and celebrated with the young interloper on the Hampden pitch

arts.ttl: Jota loves surprise moment with Celtic supporter as he lauds 'humble' teammate
arts.sum: Jota speaks after scoring for Celtic against St Johnstone in the Scottish Cup semi-final on Sunday.

arts.ttl: 'Dream was already gone' - Valakari on St Johnstone's half-time focus shift
arts.sum: St Johnstone manager Simo Valakari admits his attention shifted towards his side's relegation battle after they went 4-0 down at half-time in their Scottish Cup semi-final.

arts.ttl: Jamie O’Hara left stunned by Jason Cundy’s claim about Celtic hero Ange Postecoglou at Tottenham
arts.sum: But when Jason Cundy suggested that Postecoglou shouldn’t keep his job, even if Spurs win the Europa League, it left O’Hara baffled, as he told talkSPORT. Jason Cundy’s suggestion about Ange Postecoglou at Tottenham slammed by Jamie O’Hara

arts.ttl: Why McGregor is 'glue' that binds Rodgers' Celtic together
arts.sum: Brendan Rodgers pays tribute to captain Callum McGregor, who opened the scoring as Celtic reached yet another Scottish Cup final.

arts.ttl: Rangers takeover latest as delay hits chances of ending Celtic dominance with immediate effect
arts.sum: An American takeover at Ibrox is getting closer, but it could come too late to bring instant results to the south side

arts.ttl: 'I hope he's okay' - Jota celebrates goal with young Celtic fan
arts.sum: Celtic's Jota speaks about celebrating with a young fan who ran on to the pitch after he scored his side's fifth goal in their Scottish Cup semi-final win over St Johnstone.

arts.ttl: Callum McGregor reacts to Adam Idah video as Celtic captain gives his verdict on striker’s taxi mishap
arts.sum: Footage emerged of Idah apparently the worse for wear but he found the net in 5-0 Hampden hammering of St Johnstone

arts.ttl: Five things we learned as five-star Celtic hammer St Johnstone to book Scottish Cup final spot
arts.sum: Rodgers’ side raced into a 4-0 lead at half-time thanks to goals from Callum McGregor, a brace from Daizen Maeda and Adam Idah . It was only a couple of weeks ago that St Johnstone beat Celtic in a surprise turn of events to deny them the chance to win the Scottish Premiership .
